holidays.title: National Sugar Cookie Day
holidays.description: There are ample ways to celebrate — but really, do we even need a reason?

holidays.title: Argentine Independence day
holidays.description: Independence means voluntary restraints and discipline, and voluntary acceptance of the rule of law.

holidays.title: Barn Day
holidays.description: The traditional red barn has long been an iconic symbol of American farming communities.

holidays.title: Call of the Horizon Day
holidays.description: Stick around and let us unravel some interesting and useful facts about this day.

holidays.title: Fashion Day
holidays.description: Explore your inner style and try out new fashion trends and looks this Fashion Day.

holidays.title: Martyrdom of the Bab
holidays.description: Learn about the Bahai faith and the most defining event in its religious history.

holidays.title: National Don't Put all your Eggs in One Omelet Day
holidays.description: Whisk your eggs and heat up the pan. It’s time to make a good omelet.

holidays.title: Nunavut Day
holidays.description: Every year we celebrate Nunavut Day — the day the Parliament of Canada passed the Nunavut Act.

holidays.title: Palau Constitution Day
holidays.description: Get to know the history of Palau and the nation’s journey to becoming a republic.

holidays.title: State Rebellion Day
holidays.description: Today, we join the Paulistas in commemorating the Constitutional Revolution of 1932.

holidays.title: Christina Haack’s Birthday
holidays.description: The popular T.V. host and real estate investor, Christina Haack, loves to be in the headlines!

holidays.title: Courtney Love’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented singer and actress, opportunities don't just happen; you create them.

holidays.title: Jack White’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented American rock artist, the meaning of life is to find your gift.
